00017 /* Decode the unbeded text and set it in the output file.
00018  *
00019  */
00021 void RainbruRPG::Core::LoadBMP::decode(){
00022   char temp1[100];
00023   char temp2[100];
00024   char temp3[100];
00025 
00026   // open the bmp file
00027   BMP Image;
00028   Image.ReadFromFile( input );
00029   
00030   // prep the output stream
00031   
00032   fstream OutputText( output , ios::out );
00033   int k = 1;
00034   int MaxCharacters = Image.TellWidth() * Image.TellHeight();
00035   
00036   int i=0;
00037   int j=0;
00038   
00039   bool Stop = false;
00040   int BlankCount = 0;
00041   
00042   while( 2*k <= MaxCharacters && !Stop )
00043   {
00044    unsigned int CharacterInt = (unsigned int) (Image(i,j)->Red % 3)*243 
00045                              + (unsigned int) (Image(i,j)->Green % 3)*81
00046                              + (unsigned int) (Image(i,j)->Blue % 3)*27;
00047                              
00048                              
00049    i++;
00050    if( i >= Image.TellWidth() )
00051    { i = 0; j++; }              
00052    
00053    CharacterInt += (unsigned int) (Image(i,j)->Red % 3)*9
00054                  + (unsigned int) (Image(i,j)->Green % 3)*3
00055                  + (unsigned int) (Image(i,j)->Blue % 3);
00056                              
00057    i++;
00058    if( i >= Image.TellWidth() )
00059    { i = 0; j++; }               
00060                              
00061    char Character = (char) CharacterInt;  
00062    
00063    if( CharacterInt != 0 )
00064    {
00065     OutputText.put( Character );
00066    }
00067    else
00068    {
00069     Stop = true; 
00070    }
00071      
00072    k++;  
00073   }
00074 
00075   OutputText.close(); 
00076 
00077 
00078   // Get all the lines
00079   fstream InputText( output , ios::in );
00080 
00081   InputText.getline(temp1, 100);
00082   InputText.getline(temp2, 100);
00083   InputText.getline(temp3, 100);
00084 
00085   InputText.close();
00086 
00087   // Set the temp? value in stl string a?
00088   a1=temp1;
00089   a2=temp2;
00090   a3=temp3;
00091 
00092   // remove the temp file
00093   remove( output );
00094 }
